greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Permutation of nonnegative integers: a(n) = A003188(A163356(n)).
comment: When A207901, which is a multiplicative walk permutation, is composed from the right with this permutation, the result is A302781, another multiplicative walk permutation.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..16383
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Apr 14 2018
